metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8930 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
bsdtar in libarchive before 3.2.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denialof service (infinite loop) via an ISO with a directory that is a member ofitself.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8930` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.3
bsdtar - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.3
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.3
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libarchive package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-7ubuntu2.3').
